name: kitchen spacecraft VR
description: this is a pc VR game that only works on oculus i know for a fact that oculus quest 2 works however im not sure if anything else works anyways this game is a sandbox space game where everything has low gravity it also has a pixelated artstyle where you cant pick up anything and your stuck in 1 room however its very very early access at the moment so if you like the idea of a sandbox game in space then post a comment about what you think would be more fitting to add to the game and if i should not do anything with it at all and just cancel the project and move on whatever you think feel free to share i did not post any screenshots because if i do then they will either become outdated or show the whole game anyway so download play and tell me where i should go with it next!
